id-49457.title: Coffee Shop
id-49457.post-content:
Whether you are building a coffee shop website from scratch or revamping an existing one, our Coffee Shop template is precisely what you need. From the colors to the layout, every element of the template is going to recreate the experience.

Include the menu, photos, and showcase some of your best drinks on the homepage. With deep WooCommerce integration, you can even sell products such as coffee beans, coffee powders, and more.

Key features of the Coffee Shop template

  • Minimalistic yet highly creative coffee shop website template
  • Showcase your best drink and coffee-related products on the homepage
  • Sell your coffee-related products online
  • Fully customizable and mobile-friendly template
  • SEO-friendly template, allowing you to be found on search engines
id-49457.post-excerpt: A creatively designed website template for recreating your coffee shop experience

id-51320.title: Criminal Lawyer
id-51320.post-content:
Criminal law is a serious and highly specialized area of law. Our Criminal Lawyer Template is a responsive design that can be used for law firms and takes you through the process of designing a website for a criminal lawyer from start to finish.

From choosing an elegant, professional design to strategically implementing your practice areas, we’ve got you covered. You can even include clients' reviews so potential clients can see how others feel about your services!

Key features of the Criminal Lawyer template

  • Classy and elegant design, tailor-made for a lawyer’s website
  • Template includes CTA buttons such as free consultation and contact us today
  • Showcase your practice areas and the team of lawyers
  • Include client reviews and media clippings to build trust and authority
  • Fully customizable and can be tweaked for any practicing lawyers
id-51320.post-excerpt: Perfect solution for a criminal lawyer looking for an elegant professional website

id-55769.title: Marketing Firm
id-55769.post-content:
Are you a marketing agency looking to rebrand your business? Want a creative website design to complement the services you offer? If so, the Marketing Firm web template is just right for you. With a professionally designed layout, our marketing firm templates make it easy for you to stand out.

An impressive hero section allows you to promote your best service upfront. The homepage is beautifully designed to showcase your services, client reviews, and more.

Key features of the Marketing Firm template

  • Creative website design template for your marketing firm
  • Impressive background effects
  • Showcase your services, awards, certifications, and client reviews on the homepage
  • Fully customizable and responsive layout 
  • Templates look great across all mobile devices
id-55769.post-excerpt: An impressive website design that will give your marketing firm the perfect branding

id-53702.title: Fast Food Restaurant
id-53702.post-content:
Do you own a takeaway joint or an international fast-food chain franchise? Want to take it online? If so, you should consider our Fast Food Restaurant template. With an impressive design layout and opportune use of images, customers are sure to connect with you instantaneously.

From an online ordering system, menus, deals and offers to customer reviews, outlet details, and more, the template includes everything you need to offer your customers and build an excellent fast food restaurant website.

Key features of the Fast Food Restaurant template

  • Vibrant and creative design
  • Impressive use of images with overlay text and call-to-action buttons
  • Parallax background effects to enhance user engagement
  • WooCommerce-ready allowing you to sell online
  • 100% customizable and responsive website template
id-53702.post-excerpt: Create equally mouth-watering websites using our Fast Food Restaurant template

id-59264.title: Personal Portfolio
id-59264.post-content:
The Personal Portfolio template has been designed to showcase you and your services without going over the top. The homepage image sets the scene and the use of serif fonts and calm colors inspire confidence.

The template includes lots of options to tell your story, add examples of work, testimonials, images, video and other content. There’s also a readymade portfolio page to help you promote your work.

Key features of the Personal Portfolio template

  • Simple and attractive portfolio web template
  • Header image and headline make an instant connection
  • Pastel colors and serif fonts help inspire confidence
  • Lots of options to promote yourself and your work
  • Readymade portfolio and contact pages
  • Fully compatible with popular drag and drop page builders
id-59264.post-excerpt: Attractive portfolio template that’s ideal for showcasing personal or professional work

id-71221.title: Flavio Restaurant
id-71221.post-content:
The Flavio Restaurant website template is a modern fullscreen design with a mixture of modern and handwritten fonts and beautiful images of food throughout. It’s an engaging design with lots of color and imagery to catch the eye.

The Flavio Restaurant design has an attractive menu section with dedicated pages, a built in reservation element, attractive contact form with map and the social media elements you expect from a restaurant website. Everything can be fully customized to suit.

Key features of the Flavio Restaurant template

  • Modern fullscreen Flavio Restaurant template
  • Lots of color and attractive typography
  • Engaging images of food throughout
  • Menu section and dedicated page
  • Full compatibility with leading page builders
id-71221.post-excerpt: Bright and colorful design ideal for contemporary restaurant websites

id-59063.title: Heating And A/C Technician
id-59063.post-content:
The Heating And A/C Technician template has a minimalist feel even though it packs in the features. Thanks to a light page design with nice colors and modern fonts, the design has instant appeal with minimal distraction.

The homepage includes blocks for most uses, with the opportunity to add or remove them as required. Additional pages all reflect the core design to deliver the information visitors will need.

Key features of the Heating And A/C Technician template

  • Light, open design that draws you in
  • Great use of subtle colors and modern fonts
  • Calls to action and buttons stand out to help engage
  • Option to add or remove page blocks however you need
  • Subtle animations and parallax effects work well
  • Fully compatible with drag and drop page builders
id-59063.post-excerpt: Minimalist design that lets you showcase your heating or AC business in an engaging way

id-58084.title: Plant Shop
id-58084.post-content:
If you are running a nursery and want to take your business online, the Plant Shop template is a great starting point. The design is clean and minimalistic yet has all the correct elements to build a high-converting plant shop website.

Plant Shop web template is fully compatible with WooCommerce and allows you to set up your store quickly. Add your latest plants, customer reviews, and more on the impressive-looking homepage. 

Key features of the Plant Shop template

  • Simple, clean design that comes with all the correct elements
  • Impressive hero image, best to promote your product line
  • Deep integration with WooCommerce, allowing you to sell online quickly
  • Simple yet highly effective product pages
  • Page builder ready
id-58084.post-excerpt: Simple and minimalistic design perfect to create a high converting plant shop website

id-47609.title: Online Furniture Store
id-47609.post-content:
The right furniture livens up your home. It sets the ​​stage for comfortable and cozy living spaces. And what better way to set the tone online than having the perfect website template. 

The Online Furniture Store template is beautifully designed, helping you create an instant engagement with your customers. The template is designed to help you sell all kinds of furniture for living rooms, bedrooms, kitchens, and bathrooms.

Key features of the Online Furniture Store template

  • Beautifully designed website template
  • Showcase your latest products and best sellers on the homepage
  • Offers deals and offers on the homepage
  • Build an email list by getting customers to sign up for your newsletter
  • SEO-friendly and WooCommerce-ready template
id-47609.post-excerpt: Well designed eCommerce web template to sell all kinds of home decor

id-58970.title: Cycle Shop
id-58970.post-content:
The Cycle Shop template is an easy way to take advantage of the global rise in cycling. It’s an attractive modern template with a full screen image on the homepage that opens out into a modern, well-balanced design.

The template can integrate seamlessly with WooCommerce so you can sell products easily, and the template as a whole can be fully customized to fit your brand.

Key features of the Cycle Shop template

  • Modern cycling shop website template designed to engage
  • Fully integrates with WooCommerce for an online store
  • Attractive product areas and product pages
  • Product highlight blocks already built into the design
  • Option to add products, pages and sections quickly and easily
  • Fully compatible with leading drag and drop page builders
id-58970.post-excerpt: Impactful eCommerce template designed for cycle shops or any type of online retailer

id-59046.title: Roofing Agency
id-59046.post-content:
The Roofing Agency template has a clean, crisp look that provides a professional persona from the start. Combined with attractive imagery and careful use of colors and white space, it delivers exactly the impression you would want.

The template homepage uses a flat design with a mix of colors, images and white space that delivers impact without overloading the senses. Additional pages reflect these qualities, for a fully coherent design.

Key features of the Roofing Agency template

  • Clean, crisp design ideal for trades or construction companies
  • Excellent mix of features throughout
  • Great balance of color, images and whitespace
  • Bold color to highlight buttons and calls to action
  • Contract form front and center to encourage conversion
  • Fully compatible with leading drag and drop page builders
id-59046.post-excerpt: Clean, crisp agency website design that addresses user intent from the very beginning

id-59018.title: Coffee House
id-59018.post-content:
The Coffee House template uses a warm, heritage look that can work so well for baristas and coffee shops. It creates a warm, welcoming vibe that invites you to explore, which is exactly what we want from a coffee house website.

The homepage has rich images, warm colors and plenty of whitespace for balance. There’s a menu section and an option to sell coffee by integrating WooCommerce. It’s a very flexible template!

Key features of the Coffee House template

  • Precisely the feel you expect from a coffee house
  • Warm, welcoming colors and fonts
  • Attractive menu section and page
  • Can integrate with WooCommerce to sell products
  • Instagram section built into the homepage
  • Compatible with leading drag and drop page builders
id-59018.post-excerpt: Give a warm welcome to visitors with this engaging template for cafes and coffee shops

id-58953.title: Construction
id-58953.post-content:
The Construction website template makes an instant impact with bold contrast colors and a deep blue image. This design is reflected throughout all pages but can easily be changed to suit your brand.

The template has a bold homepage with lots of content areas and a professional feel demanded by the niche. There are also extra pages you can use to outline products or services, add a portfolio or anything you choose.

Key features of the Construction template

  • Bold design that makes an instant impact
  • Good use of contrast colors and fonts to create a professional look
  • Lots of content blocks that can be customized at will
  • Add, remove or change pages as required
  • Areas for testimonials, certifications and other social proof
  • Compatible with popular drag and drop page builders
id-58953.post-excerpt: Composed design that makes an impact for all the right reasons, ideal for construction

id-59004.title: eCourse
id-59004.post-content:
The eCourse template offers an alternative to the predictable with a bright, welcoming vibe. While mocked up for coders, you can easily see how it could be customized to suit any type of eLearning website.

The design is light, open and modern. The homepage includes simple graphics and imagery that makes an impact, along with customizable content blocks you can tweak however you like.

Key features of the eCourse template

  • Attractive design that stands out from the norm
  • Customizable pages and content blocks
  • Ideal for eLearning and compatible with most LMS
  • Can feature audio and video within lessons or as promotion
  • Great layout with a welcoming feel
  • Compatible with popular drag and drop page builders
id-59004.post-excerpt: Modern, accessible template ideal for websites that offer online learning or utilize LMS
